column5: As most of you guys already know, it's cold up here in the winter. So, what do we wear to keep our feet while ice fishing? Nothing.
Yep, after you lose your feet to frostbite they give you a nice new shiny pair of wooden ones!
I seen a few hippies that still walk around town barefooted, but on the ice.
Wish we had ice to freeze or feet on!
guess you loose all feeling in the feet after a couple hrs on the Ice eh?

i've done that, in just boxers, sleepin in the hut we used to leave one line out not far from the hut with a bell on it, went out in my skivees a few times, you don't feel the cold until after you bring up the fish
Nice trout!  I'd take a nip on the toes from jack frost to reel in that little fella.  I'm sure the propane heated hut wasn't too far away.  Congrats dude.  Corn Nug
